description: The Ebisu Taisai is a 3-day autumn festival that takes place throughout Ebisu Shrine in celebration of Ebisu, the god of wealth and commerce. It is one of the three largest festivals in Hiroshima. This year, the festival will be pairing up with the stores of the local shopping district, which will be putting on large bargain sales called "Ebessan" (Ebisu) or "Ebisu-kou" (in honor of Ebisu) to coincide with the festivities. For the duration of this popular festival, Ebisu-dori (Ebisu Street) and Chuo-doori (Main Street) will be lined with vendors selling lucky bamboo rakes.

Temple Yoga offers blissful relaxing yoga that relaxes your mind and body. Yoga and meditation are performed in a special temple space far from everyday life.
A healing yoga based on Hiroshima Prefecture lemons, wrapped in aromas formulated with the theme of prayer. A meditation in the basement of the main hall where light and sound are blocked.
